reference.shortdesc: The bookeventtype element indicates a custom publication event, for example, updated, indexed, or deprecated.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The value attribute is used to indicate the event type.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookeventtype element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: For this element, the value attribute specifies the type of book event.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the bookeventtype element can be used to specify a custom publication event:
